Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    Public interface for drawable objects.
    Mobile
    Public interface for mobile objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Corridor
    Represents a corridor with its start and end x,y coordinates.
    Creature
    Represents an entity that is alive, ie. has stats like health, and is mobile.
    Entity
    Represents an object that is physically represented by a glyph, and has a x,y position.
    Glyph
    Represents the graphical element of an object (ie.
    InputHandler
    Singleton class for handling input.
    Item  
    Main  
    Map
    Represents the environment of the game, with a variable size.
    Player
    Represents the controllable entity and creature of the game, a.k.a the player character.
    RLTerminal
    Represents a rogue-like oriented terminal.
    Room
    Represents a room with its coordinates and size attributes.
    Tile
    Represents a tile element of the map.
    TileFactory
    Singleton class for handling the instantiation of tiles.
